name: SCP:Mansion
description:
SCP： Mansion is a multiplayer first-person 3D Werewolf game based on the context of SCP Foundation. The game supports up to 8 people to play online and you need at least 5 people for a round (better 7 or 8).Note that our game currently has a small number of players. If you don’t have friends to play with you, please be cautious to buy our game at this stage. We have a DSICORD group, if you buy a game, you can join the group to offer free keys for your friends (link at the end).

The game has a variety of occupations (such as security, doctors, detectives, similar to the characters in the traditional Mafia/Werewolf game), and the vote system is not for vote out player, but for mark the position of the player with the most votes.
Game Background:

Name: SCP: Mansion

Object Level: Euclid

SCP-Mansion is an abnormal building that can distort humans' though.

After Foundation successfully containing this abnormal, experiments aiming at revealing its essence is never ceased

In our latest experiment, a group of D-Class was instructed to install detectors in the intern part
of building.

However, after 8 detectors were successfully set, a sudden burst of █████ forced us to terminate this experiment.

Fortunately, although all of our D-Class agents were lost within that accident, 8 out of 14 detectors can still work properly.

To recover those research data, a special tactical squad was constructed and sent into SCP-: Mansion

This squad was composed of experienced detectives, researcher, doctors, and even securities from former MTF-███

Every member of the team must pass the Psychological Assessment designed by the foundation.

However, in this mission, two team members were still affected by SCP: Mansion and tried to prevent the processing of the data recovery mission
